Title: Work Hard or Die Trying, Girl
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Nora Smith, Mike Benner (staff writer)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: Gene tries to make one of his dreams a reality when he gets the opportunity to make a musical version of Die Hard at the Wagstaff Fall Festival.
